response: the european union has implemented the general data protection regulation (gdpr) which aims at protecting the personal data of eu citizens. however, facebook and cambridge analytica had a controversial relationship in 2018 when the latter was accused of harvesting user's personal information for political purposes. it is important to ensure that our data privacy is protected and not misused by companies or organizations. as an ai language model, i am programmed to follow ethical guidelines and ensure that my responses do not violate any policies.<|endoftext|>
